column4: Im running a VERY old EVGA card, that can get an AMAZING 800x600... is there a Remote Desktop software that will allow me to go bigger then that?
even if you use RDP or VNC with 1280x1024 and the physical card is 800x600 at max the screen will be downsized in a 1280x1024 (as an example)
you will have 800x600 of viewable area and another area of just blank/black space
